name: Solitaire Sunday: Card Game
description:
Solitaire Sunday: TriPeaks Card Game

Are you a fan of mobile card games? Introducing Solitaire Sunday, a brand new solitaire card game where the classic gameplay of tripeaks meets unique features!

The game is both easy to play and at the same time challenging. You might ask “How is that so?” Play the game now and see for yourself! You’ll train your brain without even knowing.

As you beat levels, you’ll not only earn coins but also encounter different special cards, fun features, and cute backgrounds created only for you. Combos and streaks will reward you with extra coins, extra cards, and some treats!

Lots of features and events await! Including daily missions, jackpots, lucky wheels, special cards and gifts! And more will come, be ready for our surprises!

Some of the special events are as follows:
-Garden of Spades
-Heart Factory
-Black Suits
-Red Hill

Beat levels to train your brain & solving these puzzles will keep you entertained! It is fun, challenging, and visually appealing. Come play now!
